document.full_text: security officers have placed an important tibetan monastery in sichuan province under lockdown after a young monk committed suicide by setting himself on fire on march 16 to protest chinese policies in tibetan areas.
document.title: asia: china: monastery sealed off after suicide protest
lines_and_colors: security officers have placed an important tibetan monastery in sichuan province under lockdown after a young monk committed suicide by setting himself on fire on march 16 to protest chinese policies in tibetan areas.
